When reviewing this document, review the audit workpapers to ensure consistency with reported scope and final audit findings, and assess comprehensive testing and documentation.

 

Verify some of the work performed by the auditor, particularly in relation to noted exceptions.

 

Consider the following:

 

  • Do workpapers identify the scope of the audit performed?
  • Were the scope and audit procedures performed adequate for the
    risk entailed?
  • Do the workpapers indicate any red flags that were not raised by the auditor? Do the audit workpapers show weaknesses that were not identified in audit results or board reports?
  • Do the workpapers exhibit any red flags for fraud?
  • Was there any follow-up on the issues cited in the audit report?
